review-of-systems.general: Denies fatigue, malaise, fever, weight loss
review-of-systems.ent: denies ear pain or discharge, nasal obstruction or discharge, sor throat
review-of-systems.cardiovascular: denies chest pain, palpitations, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, constipation
review-of-systems.gastrointestinal: denies abdominal pain, dysphagia, nausea, comiting, diarrhea. constipation
review-of-systems.genitourinary: denies hematuria, frequency, urgency, dysuria, discharge, impotence, incontinece
review-of-systems.musculoskeletal: dnies back pain, joint swlling, joint stiffness, joint pain
review-of-systems.skin: denies rashes, itching, lumps, sores, lesions, color change
review-of-systems.neurologic: denies syncope, seizures, transient paralysis, weakness, paresthesias
review-of-systems.psychiatric: denies depression, anxiety, mental disturbance, difficulty sleeping, suicidal ideation, hallicinations, paranoia
review-of-systems.endocrine: denies polyuria, polydispsia, polyphagia, weight change, heat or cold, intolerance
review-of-systems.lymphatic: denies easy or excessive bruising, history of blood transfusions, anemia, bleeding disorders, adenopathy, chills, sweats
review-of-systems.immunologic: denies urticaria, hay fever, frequent utis; denies HIV high risk behaviors

physical-exam.general-appearance: well developed, well nourished, no acute distress
physical-exam.eyes: conjunctiva and libs normal, perrla, eomi, fundi wnl
physical-exam.ent: tm clear, nares clear, oral exam wnl
physical-exam.respiratory: clear to ausculation and percussion, respiratory effort normal
physical-exam.cardiovascular: regular rate and thythm, S1-S2, no murmur, rub or gallop, no bruits, peripheral pulses normal symmetric, no cyanosis, clubbing, edema or varicosities
physical-exam.skin: clear, good turgor, color WNL, no rashes, lesions, or ulcerations
physical-exam.problems: blood pressure is lower. feet are inspected and there are no callouses, no compromised skin. No Visions complaints
physical-exam.impression: sub optimal sugar, control with retinopathy and neropathy, high glucometer readings. Will work harder on diet. Will increase insulin by 2 units.

plan.treatment: Will have annual foot exam at next visit
